ComicInfo.Summary:
The defenders go all out to destroy Dan Tanna Junction, with a suicide run by Judge Souster finally taking it out.
Havign defeated the leader of the Nort's primitive GI's Rogue is now their leader, unbeknownst to the Nort leadership. He has them refuse recall, and set's them free.
